00022 #ifndef INCLUDED_TUIOPOINT_H
00023 #define INCLUDED_TUIOPOINT_H
00024 
00025 #include "TuioTime.h"
00026 #include <cmath>
00027 
00028 #ifndef M_PI
00029 #define M_PI    3.14159265358979323846
00030 #endif
00031 
00032 namespace TUIO {
00033         
00041         class LIBDECL TuioPoint {
00042                 
00043         protected:
00047                 float xpos;
00051                 float ypos;
00055                 TuioTime currentTime;
00059                 TuioTime startTime;
00060                 
00061         public:
00066                 TuioPoint (float xp, float yp) {
00067                         xpos = xp;
00068                         ypos = yp;
00069                         currentTime = TuioTime::getSessionTime();
00070                         startTime = currentTime;
00071                 };
00072         
00081                 TuioPoint (TuioTime ttime, float xp, float yp) {
00082                         xpos = xp;
00083                         ypos = yp;
00084                         currentTime = ttime;
00085                         startTime = currentTime;
00086                 };
00087                 
00094                 TuioPoint (TuioPoint *tpoint) {
00095                         xpos = tpoint->getX();
00096                         ypos = tpoint->getY();
00097                         currentTime = TuioTime::getSessionTime();
00098                         startTime = currentTime;
00099                 };
00100                 
00104                 ~TuioPoint(){};
00105                 
00112                 void update (TuioPoint *tpoint) {
00113                         xpos = tpoint->getX();
00114                         ypos = tpoint->getY();
00115                 };
00116                 
00124                 void update (float xp, float yp) {
00125                         xpos = xp;
00126                         ypos = yp;
00127                 };              
00128                 
00137                 void update (TuioTime ttime, float xp, float yp) {
00138                         xpos = xp;
00139                         ypos = yp;
00140                         currentTime = ttime;
00141                 };
00142 
00143                 
00148                 float getX() const{ 
00149                         return xpos;
00150                 };
00151                 
00156                 float getY() const{
00157                         return ypos;
00158                 };
00159                 
00167                 float getDistance(float xp, float yp) const{
00168                         float dx = xpos-xp;
00169                         float dy = ypos-yp;
00170                         return sqrtf(dx*dx+dy*dy);
00171                 }
00172 
00180                 float getScreenDistance(float xp, float yp, int w, int h) const{
00181                         float dx = w*xpos-w*xp;
00182                         float dy = h*ypos-h*yp;
00183                         return sqrtf(dx*dx+dy*dy);
00184                 }
00185                 
00192                 float getDistance(TuioPoint *tpoint) const{
00193                         return getDistance(tpoint->getX(),tpoint->getY());
00194                 }
00195                 
00203                  float getAngle(float xp, float yp) const{
00204                         float side = xpos-xp;
00205                         float height = ypos-yp;
00206                         float distance = getDistance(xp,yp);
00207                         
00208                         float angle = (float)(asin(side/distance)+M_PI/2);
00209                         if (height<0) angle = 2.0f*(float)M_PI-angle;
00210                         
00211                         return angle;
00212                 }
00213                 
00220                 float getAngle(TuioPoint *tpoint) const{
00221                         return getAngle(tpoint->getX(),tpoint->getY());
00222                 }
00223 
00231                 float getAngleDegrees(float xp, float yp) const{
00232                         return ((getAngle(xp,yp)/(float)M_PI)*180.0f);
00233                 }
00234 
00241                 float getAngleDegrees(TuioPoint *tpoint) const{
00242                         return ((getAngle(tpoint)/(float)M_PI)*180.0f);
00243                 }
00244                 
00251                 int getScreenX(int width) const{ 
00252                         return (int)floor(xpos*width+0.5f);
00253                 };
00254                 
00261                 int getScreenY(int height) const{
00262                         return (int)floor(ypos*height+0.5f);
00263                 };
00264                 
00270                 TuioTime getTuioTime() const{ 
00271                         return currentTime;
00272                 };
00273                 
00279                 TuioTime getStartTime() const{
00280                         return startTime;
00281                 };
00282         };
00283 };
00284 #endif
